mapper.insert: insert into sell_apply_order_${storeId} (id, type, create_time, result_order_id, prodcing_way, order_status, clear_status, client_id, in_warehouse_id, in_total_quantity, in_received_quantity, in_not_received_quantity, out_warehouse_id, out_total_quantity, out_sent_quantity, out_not_sent_quantity, total_money, discount_money, discount_coupon_id, total_discount_money, order_money, cleared_money, not_cleared_money, user_id, remark) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{resultOrderId}, #{prodcingWay}, #{orderStatus}, #{clearStatus}, #{clientId}, #{inWarehouseId}, #{inTotalQuantity}, #{inReceivedQuantity}, #{inNotReceivedQuantity}, #{outWarehouseId}, #{outTotalQuantity}, #{outSentQuantity}, #{outNotSentQuantity}, #{totalMoney}, #{discountMoney}, #{discountCouponId}, #{totalDiscountMoney}, #{orderMoney}, #{clearedMoney}, #{notClearedMoney}, #{userId}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update sell_apply_order_${storeId} set user_id = #{userId}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select sao.id, sao.type, sao.create_time, sao.result_order_id, sao.prodcing_way, sao.order_status, sao.clear_status, c.id as client_id, c.name as client_name, c.phone as client_phone, c.membership_number as client_membership_number, sao.in_warehouse_id, sao.in_total_quantity, sao.in_received_quantity, sao.in_not_received_quantity, sao.out_warehouse_id, sao.out_total_quantity, sao.out_sent_quantity, sao.out_not_sent_quantity, sao.total_money, sao.discount_money, sao.discount_coupon_id, /*查出优惠券金额*/ sao.total_discount_money, sao.order_money, sao.cleared_money, sao.not_cleared_money, u.name as user_name, sao.remark, ogs.id as ogs_id, ogs.type as ogs_type, ogs.goods_sku_id as ogs_goods_sku_id, ogs.quantity as ogs_quantity, ogs.finish_quantity as ogs_finish_quantity, ogs.not_finish_quantity as ogs_not_finish_quantity, ogs.money as ogs_money, ogs.discount_money as ogs_discount_money, ogs.remark as ogs_remark, g.name as g_name, g.id as g_id, g.bar_code as g_bar_code, gs.sku as gs_sku, gs.retail_price as gs_retail_price, gs.vip_price as gs_vip_price from ( ( ( ( sell_apply_order_${storeId} as sao left join client as c on sao.client_id = c.id ) left join user_${storeId} as u on sao.user_id = u.id ) left join order_goods_sku_${storeId} as ogs on sao.id = ogs.order_id ) left join goods_sku_${storeId} as gs on ogs.goods_sku_id = gs.id ) left join goods_${storeId} as g on gs.goods_id = g.id where sao.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into sell_result_order_${storeId} (id, type, create_time, apply_order_id, order_status, total_quantity, total_money, total_discount_money, order_money, cost_money, gross_margin_money, user_id, remark) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{applyOrderId}, #{orderStatus}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalMoney}, #{totalDiscountMoney}, #{orderMoney}, #{costMoney}, #{grossMarginMoney}, #{userId}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update sell_result_order_${storeId} set order_status = -1 where id = #{id} and order_status > 0;
mapper.select: select sro.id, sro.type, sro.create_time, sro.apply_order_id, sro.order_status, sro.total_quantity, sro.total_money, sro.total_discount_money, sro.order_money, sro.cost_money, sro.gross_margin_money, u.name as user_name, sro.user_id, sro.remark, sao.clear_status as sao_clear_status, sao.in_warehouse_id, sao.out_warehouse_id, c.name as client_name, c.phone as client_phone, c.membership_number as client_membership_number, ogs.id as ogs_id, ogs.type as ogs_type, ogs.goods_sku_id as ogs_goods_sku_id, ogs.quantity as ogs_quantity, ogs.finish_quantity as ogs_finish_quantity, ogs.not_finish_quantity as ogs_not_finish_quantity, ogs.money as ogs_money, ogs.discount_money as ogs_discount_money, ogs.operated_quantity as ogs_operated_quantity, ogs.remark as ogs_remark, g.name as g_name, g.id as g_id, g.bar_code as g_bar_code, gs.sku as gs_sku, gs.retail_price as gs_retail_price, gs.vip_price as gs_vip_price from ( ( ( ( ( sell_result_order_${storeId} as sro left join sell_apply_order_${storeId} as sao on sro.apply_order_id = sao.id ) left join client as c on sao.client_id = c.id ) left join user_${storeId} as u on sro.user_id = u.id ) left join order_goods_sku_${storeId} as ogs on ogs.order_id = sro.id ) left join goods_sku_${storeId} as gs on ogs.goods_sku_id = gs.id ) left join goods_${storeId} as g on gs.goods_id = g.id where sro.id = #{id};
